562 has

} if
} else {

and 317 has
} if
} else[/quote]

Java rules dont change in different revisions…

if (playerHasItem(440)) { if(playerLevel[13] >= 15) { int ran = misc.random(3); if ((ran == 1) || (ran == 2)) { smelt_barId = 2351; removed.add(440); addSkillXP(12, 13); sendMessage("You smelt the ore into a iron bar."); } else { smelt_barId = 0; removed.add(440); sendMessage("You fail to refine the iron ore."); } } else { sendMessage("You need a smithing level of 15 to smith iron."); } }

item.title: (FIXED!) Delete this topic
item.dc:creator: @Decs Decs
item.description:
@Decs wrote:

ok so ive been adding smithing to my server, well i got the code done but theres 1 part missing that i just couldnt remember how to do.

if (playerHasItem(440) && (playerLevel[13] >= 15)) { int ran = misc.random(3); if ((ran == 1) || (ran == 2)) { smelt_barId = 2351; removed.add(440); addSkillXP(12, 13); sendMessage("You smelt the ore into a iron bar."); } else { smelt_barId = 0; removed.add(440); sendMessage("You fail to refine the iron ore."); } }

its letting me only do 1 of the lines i need.

i want it to say this when it fails to smelt.

sendMessage("You fail to refine the iron ore.");

but i also want it to say this when their smithing level is lower then 15.

sendMessage("You need level 15 smithing to make iron bars.");

Read full topic
